testimonials.title: What Users Say

reviews.content: NextName helped me find the perfect domain in minutes. The price comparison feature is very useful and saved our company considerable costs.
reviews.author: Zhang Ming
reviews.title: Tech Company CEO

reviews.content: As a developer, I often need to register domains for projects. NextName's search function is intelligent and quickly understands my needs.

reviews.content: Clean interface, powerful features, and most importantly completely free. Now it's my go-to tool for domain queries.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Quickly understand NextName's features and usage

questions.question: Is NextName completely free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, all of NextName's query functions are completely free. We don't charge any query fees or require user registration. We earn revenue through partnerships with registrars to provide free services to users.

questions.question: How often is price comparison data updated?
questions.answer: Our price data is automatically updated every hour to ensure you see the latest market prices. For popular domain extensions, we update price information even more frequently.

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Perfect Domain?
